title: Store not updated so I can't buy
body: It says the SKT skins are out but everytime i restart the client nothing has changed

replies.body:
Hey! 

This should be resolved! Lemme know if you're still experiencing issues. :)

Might be a problem on the boards today. 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/hLIHFNnI-skin-prices-increas-starting-from-patch-714?comment=00170000

If you want to chat with someone in the office, make sure they are aware.
Hey! Thanks for the heads up!
No problem, have a good rest of your day.
Man, I need coffee, I'm double posting. ;-; Haha, thanks! Same to you! ^-^
Thanks for the heads up! We're on the case. <3
